devdoc.details: Implements minimal proxy pattern for gas-efficient deployment

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

params.contractType: The type of contract that failed to initialize

InsufficientBalance(uint256,uint256).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params.implementationType: The type of implementation being updated

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

params.factoryAddress: The address of the newly deployed factory
params.lockAddress: The address of the newly deployed lock contract
params.owner: The address of the factory owner

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

params.owner: Address that will own the factory

returns.factoryAddress: The address of the newly deployed factory
returns.lockAddress: The address of the newly deployed lock contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.newFee: The new fee amount in wei

params.implementationType: The type of implementation to update

params.recipient: The address to receive the fees

devdoc.title: Foundry

FeeOperationFailed(string).notice: Thrown when a fee-related operation fails

InitializationFailed(string).notice: Thrown when initialization of a contract fails

InsufficientDeploymentFee(uint256,uint25.notice: Thrown when the deployment fee provided is insufficient

InvalidImplementationType(string).notice: Thrown when an invalid implementation type is provided

NoFeesToWithdraw().notice: Thrown when attempting to withdraw zero fees or when contract has no balance

ZeroAddress().notice: Thrown when an address parameter is zero

DeploymentFeeUpdated(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the deployment fee is updated

ImplementationUpdated(string,address,add.notice: Emitted when implementation addresses are updated

SystemDeployed(address,address,address).notice: Emitted when a new system (factory + lock) is deployed

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize the Foundry contract

deploySystem(address,uint256,(uint256,ui.notice: Deploy both factory and lock contracts in a single transaction

updateImplementation(string,address).notice: Update the implementation address for a specific contract type

userdoc.notice: Main deployer contract for the bonding curve system
